overview:
Brad Hefta-Gaub, Co-Founder and CEO of Konamoxt, is a19 year veteran of online media technology development and business management.

Prior to founding Konamoxt he served as SVP Media Operations at Revenue Science (3yrs), with P&L responsibility for a the strategic media partners business line that included AOL, The Financial Times, Reuters and other leading internet brands. He also served as CTO and SVP of Engineering leading the development and operations of Revenue Scienceâ€™s highly scalable behavioral targeting platform that processes over a billion transactions a day.

Prior to Revenue Science, He was Vice President of Software Products at RealNetworks, Inc. (8yrs). During his tenure he was responsible for the design and development of the RealSystem media platform, RealAudio, and RealVideo, and management of product development for RealNetworksâ€™ more than $100m/year Media Systems Division. As one of the earliest developers at RealNetworks he developed the first commercially available Netscape browser plugin.

He holds a number of patents and patents pending in online media, digital rights management, online advertising, and user generated content publishing.
